nodes.text: The Houk Syndicate Lair was a cave system in the Beastmark Hills in the Old Paths region on the planet Voss. It was used as a base by the Houk Syndicate during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.
The Houk Syndicate Lair appears as a location in the Old Paths on Voss in the 2011 massively multiplayer online roleplaying video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
